abilities.name: Cut Throat
abilities.details: Every few seconds, Draevyn's basic attack reaps the enemy, causing them to bleed, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) over a duration.

abilities.name: Death Hook
abilities.details:
Draevyn swings up his chain then throws the hook part at a target direction, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to the first enemy hit.

Death Hook also slightly pulls the target toward him and then briefly slows the target.

abilities.name: Slaughter Zone
abilities.details: Draevyn selects a target area and while he's inside, his basic attacks have increased range and deal additional physical damage (scaling with physical power).

abilities.name: The Hunt
abilities.details:
Draevyn gains increased movement speed and becomes camouflaged for a duration. He will gain increased attack speed when exiting camouflage.

Takedown on enemy hero that Draevyn recently damaged will reset The Hunt cooldown.

Draevyn can cast Slaughter Zone without revealing himself.

abilities.name: Death Knocks Twice
abilities.details:
Draevyn slashes the chain in a large radius twice.

The first slash deals physical damage (scaling with physical power) and greatly slows all enemies hit.

The second slash deals physical damage (scaling with physical power plus the target's missing health).

Enemies hit will be affected with Cut Throat and those who are already affected will have the duration reset.
